page.title: 19RELIGION Non-conformist
page.content: { }There is a{Baptist}Church in Station Road.It is quite new and was built when the town centre was redeveloped and the old building pulled down. The newest building is a{Brethren meeting hall. It has just been built in Norman Road. There is a Kingdom Hall being built by the{Jehovah's Witnesses}in the factory estate. The{Methodist}Church in London Road has many members,they have Boy's Brigade and Girl's Brigade there. { }The{Mormons}go to Haywards Heath for their meetings.{ A Congregational church was built around 1863,for many years it lay derelict. In 1975 it was converted into a{Pentecostal}Church. The{Salvation Army}meet in Cyprus Road,their leader is a sergeant.
